content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Smelting Facility at Position (-15.0, -49.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace at position (-15.0, -49.0) used for smelting iron ore into iron plates.

### Coal Mining and Storage Facility
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill at position (40.0, -84.0) extracting coal.
- Wooden chest at position (40.5, -82.5) storing extracted coal.
- Wooden chest at position (41.5, -83.5) for additional storage.

### Iron Plate Transfer System
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner inserter at position (54.5, -83.5) transferring iron plates from the chest at position (56.5, -83.5).

### Coal Transport System
Consists of the following entities:
- Belt group with multiple belts connecting various positions, transporting coal with an inventory of 5 coal.

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when inserting items without available inventory
- Ensure you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to insert them into a structure or entity.
